txt.en: Dr치ttur is located in Amd칙n.\n\nBring the arms and armour to Dr치ttur.
'A grim task, this. We shall collect the bodies of our brothers when there is more time, and honour their deeds.'

'The field around Durin's Stone has seen much bloodshed. The fallen from each side lie piled upon each other, food for the carrion birds. The enemy keeps watch on the field and are rearing to fight. They would swiftly attack and overwhelm a group sent to collect our slain comrades. One quick, nimble dwarf, however, might be able to retrieve their arms and armour without rousing our foes.\n\n'Go forth; gather helmets, shields, and swords from our brothers. The Orcs must not be allowed to steal their arms and armour.'
Dwarf-bodies litter the battlefield around Durin's Stone. Their arms and armour must not fall into the hands of the enemy.
Fallen dwarves are strewn across the field near Durin's Stone.\n\nYou should retrieve arms and armour from the fallen.
